results.title: Holidays on the River Yarra
results.creator_credit: Jungle Pictures, Film Victoria, Fiona Cochrane and Leo Berkeley
results.brief_description: Mick and Eddie, (Craig Adams and Luke Elliot), grow up tough in the big city. Typical teenagers, on the lookout for adventure, they struggle to succeed in a world of violence and industrial decay. To build their dream, it will take everything they’ve got in their fight against the system.

results.title: Holidays and waterways
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Australian Canoe Clubs and Eric Thompson
results.brief_description: Canoeing is one of Australia’s popular holiday sports. Along the Mitta Mitta river and the upper reaches of the Yarra, campers spend their holidays fishing, swimming, hiking and canoeing. The most common type of canoe used is the light, manoeuvrable Canadian type. Streams after heavy rains provide adventure and a test of good judgment; some explore mountain streams; compete in canoe trials or train for Olympic events. On the coast, canoe surfing is popular, but, nonetheless hazardous.

results.title: Holiday: a short tale
results.brief_description: Contemplative short film of one man’s journey of the mind to escape the reality of his daily existence. This is a visually evocative piece, backed by an expressive music soundtrack and the sounds of nature.

results.title: Holiday with a purpose
results.brief_description: Shows the activities of children at the Lord Mayor’s Holiday Camp at Portsea, Victoria. The daily life, sporting activities and excursions, as well as the medical treatment received by the children.

results.title: Holiday haunts
results.brief_description: Travel documentary of New Zealand showing Rotorua, Maori guides, Papakure Geyser and Puarenga Geyser, Rotorua golf and bowls, swimming and spa, Lake Poto-iti, fairy springs where the salmon trout are hand-fed.

results.title: Holiday experiences = Ferienerlebnisse
results.creator_credit: Progress Film, D E F A Studio and Otto Sacher
results.brief_description: In German language. A boy and girl’s adventures in the snow. In a comical train, they travel to a high mountain and the boy skis down it collecting a toboggan en route, sailing along the train’s tracks and finally bumping into the train which concertinas. The girl helps pull the train into shape again and they get in and go home.

results.title: Holiday album
results.creator_credit: Herschells Films and Roy A. Driver
results.brief_description: Snapshots from a family holiday album show tourist attractions throughout Victoria: recreation in the metropolitan area; winter sports at Mt Buffalo; springtime in the Grampians; a leisurely journey down the Murray in the paddle-steamer “Coonawarra”; sailing and fishing at Lakes Entrance; forest country at Marysville; the beaches along the Great Ocean Road. Commentary by Robert Peach.

results.title: Holiday
results.brief_description: From ABC Television’s award-winning and popularly acclaimed travel program ‘Holiday’ comes a series of eight fabulous videos covering every facet of holidaying in the states and territories of Australia. Whether you’re looking for a luxury five star resort or the chance to get off the beaten track, this series has got Australia covered.
